i am having an unusual problem with the game. i have searched for hours and could not find a solution, so it would be very helpful if anyone have any suggestion. the problem is, everything is ok when the game is starting but when the game screen appears, it is only on at the top-left corner of the screen. the subtitles are where they should be, as well as the hud. please guys, if anyone can suggest anything....
found the solution, just had to disable anti-aliasing...

Never mind I figured it out. I didn't name the character that's why.
